snippet.title: Railroad Corporation 2 - Official Early Access Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Railroad Corporation 2 will be heading to Early Access on PC on September 9, 2024. Wishlist on Steam now!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1677970/Railroad_Corporation_2/

The 20th century heralds the new age of electrification for the mighty railroad, and with it, a new opportunity to make your fortune. Build your empire carefully, as you deploy modern electric and diesel locomotives, lay new tracks, transport goods and passengers, and stay ahead of the competition.

Stay up to date with Iceberg Interactive and Railroad Corporation 2:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Iceberg_Int
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@iceberg_int
Discord: http://discord.gg/iceberginteractive


#railroadcorporation #Steam #traintycoon #tycoon #strategy
